author: Gavin Sykes <gavin@gavinsykes.uk> (https://gavinsykes.uk/)
description: An library to build an easy column chart, based on the svgchrt library
name: svgchrt-column

scripts.ci: npm run build && npm run test:cover
scripts.clean-slate-protocol-sir: shx rm -rf coverage dist docs node_modules .nyc_output
scripts.lint:prettier: npm run lint && npm run prettier
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test:prettier && npm run docs && git add docs && git commit -m"Bumping version and updating docs"
scripts.test: mocha -r ts-node/register dev/**/*.spec.ts && alex && npm run lint
scripts.test:prettier: npm run prettier && npm run test
